open orlov@iphoster
cd /var/www/site1
rm ./public/dist/*
rm ./public/layout/*
put .\package.json ./
put .\composer.json ./
put -neweronly .\app\* ./app/*
put -neweronly .\config\* ./config/*
put -neweronly .\public\dist\* ./public/dist/*
put -neweronly .\public\layout\* ./public/layout/*
put -neweronly .\public\mix-manifest.json ./public/mix-manifest.json
put -neweronly .\resources\* ./resources/*
put -neweronly .\routes\* ./routes/*
close
exit
